item.title: Ukrainian-Language Documentary ‘Sanatorium’ Selected as Irish Oscar Entry
item.description: The Irish Film and Television Academy has chosen Ireland’s official entry for the international feature film category of the next Academy Awards. “Sanatorium,” the Irish-made, Ukrain
